mapper.select: select b.bbsseq, title, wdate, rdate, ref, likecount, readcount, thumnail, nickname, ifnull(cnt, 0) cmtcount from member a, (select row_number()over(order by ${order} desc) rnum, memberseq, bbsseq, title, wdate, rdate, ref, likecount, readcount, thumnail from bbs where bbstag=#{bbstag} and del=0 order by ${order} desc) b LEFT OUTER JOIN (select count(*) cnt, bbsseq from bbs_comment group by bbsseq) c on b.bbsseq=c.bbsseq where a.memberseq=b.memberseq and rnum between ${start} and ${end}
select bbsseq, title, content, wdate, likecount, readcount, del, bbstag, b.memberseq, b.nickname from bbs a, member b where a.memberseq=b.memberseq and bbsseq=#{bbsseq}
select EXISTS(select * from like_bbs where memberseq=#{memberseq} and bbsseq=#{bbsseq}) as liking
mapper.insert: insert into bbs(memberseq, title, content, bbstag, thumnail) values(#{memberseq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{bbstag}, #{thumnail})
insert into bbs_comment(memberseq, bbsseq, cmtcontent, cmtdel, ref, step) values(#{memberseq}, #{bbsseq}, #{cmtcontent}, 0, (select ifnull(max(ref), 0)+1 from bbs_comment a), 0)

insert into bbs_comment(memberseq, bbsseq, cmtcontent, cmtdel, ref, step) values(#{memberseq}, #{bbsseq}, #{cmtcontent}, 0, (select ref from bbs_comment a where commentseq=#{commentseq}), (select step from bbs_comment b where commentseq=#{commentseq})+1)
